title: WIA Am I Eligible
text: To be eligible for program services you must be: --Native American, Alaskan Native or Native Hawaiian
one: How Do You Establish You Are Native American
two: Be unemployed for at least seven days, working but in receipt of a lay-off letter, working part-time, working below your level of training (underemployed) or be economically disadvantaged (low income).
three: Be eighteen years old or older
four: Be a resident in our current service area which is the entire states of Kentucky, Maryland, Pennsylvania, West Virginia and the District of Columbia.
five: Be registered at the employment one-stop office of your state:
